title: Pls Auto give players smite when they are assigned the jungle role

replies.body: A better solution is to somehow save sommoners by role, so I have the spells I had for that role the last time I played that role.  I don't know if that would be too technically difficult though

I could see this being a problem when teams need to have players switch roles for various reasons. Perhaps they give a warning after picks are made if the player doesn't have smite, maybe even give it a ring or some type of alarming sound.
Effort is hard.  Must do everything for players, so they don't forget. >.>

This is great since they are already adding in buff timers that every one can see. What we need now is items that will farm camps for you and perform ganks with one click. Then our fisher price moba will be complete.
